Can't go to work? Schools closed? Worrie: Huwezi enda kazi? Shule zimefungwa? Wasiwasi kuhusu pesa? Ni kawaida kua na msongo wa mawazo na kuzidiwa

One-on-One time is free and fun.It makes children feel loved and secure: School shutdown is also a chance to make better relationships with our children and teenagers. One-on-One time is free and fun. It makes children feel loved and secure, and shows them that they are important

Set aside time to spend with each child: Weka muda kando wa kushiriki/kuwa na kila mtoto.

It can be at the same time eachday so c: Waweza kua wa dakika 20 tu, au zaidi - ni juu yetu. Waweza kuwa kwa wakati mmoja kila siku kwa hivyo watoto na vijana wanaweza kuutazamia.

Copy their facial expression and sounds: Nakili jinsi wanavyojieleza usoni na sauti
Sing songs, make music with pots and spo: Imba nyimbo, fanya muziki na vyungu au vijiko
Tell a story, read a book, or share pict: Simulia hadithi, soma kitabu au gawa picha
Talk about something they like: sports,: Talk about something they like: sports, music, celebrities, friends
Go for a walk - outdoors or around the h: Nenda kwa matembezi - nje ya boma au kwenye boma
Exercise together to their favorite musi: Fanya mazoezi pamoja ya muziki wanaoupenda

Give them your full attention.Have fun!: Wasikilize, watazame. Wape umakinifu wako wote. Uwe na furaha!

Ask your child what they would like to d: Muulize mwanao kile ambacho angependa kufanya.

If they want to do something that isn't.(see next screen): Kuchagua kunajenga kujiamini. Wakitaka kufanya kisicho bora na umbali wa mwili, basi ii ni fursa kuongea nao kuhusu hili. (angalia kurasa ifuatayo)

Switch off the TV and phone.This is virus-free time: Zima TV na simu. Huu ni wakati usio na virusi

Do a chore together - make cleaning and: Fanya kazi pamoja - fanya usafi ama mchezo wa upishi!

It's hard to feel positive when our kids.We often end up saying \"Stop doing tha: Ni vigumu kujihisi chanya wakati watoto au vijana wetu wanatuendesha visivyo. Maranyingi sisi husema "acha kufanya hivyo!" Lakini watoto kwa wakati mwingi wanaweza kufanya yale tutawauliza iwapo tutawapa maelekezo chanya na sifa nyingi kwa yale waliofanya vizuri

Use positive words when telling your chi: Use positive words when telling your child what to do; like 'Please put your clothes away' (instead of 'Don't make a mess')
Do a chore together - make cleaning and: Do a chore together - make cleaning and cooking a game!
